title.rendered: Kone Elevators partners with Smile Foundation for healthcare in Guwahati

content.rendered:
Kone Elevators partners with Smile Foundation for healthcare in Guwahati

Kone Elevators has teamed up with Smile Foundation to increase primary healthcare services in Guwahati. Under this agreement, Kone Elevators supports our efforts to deliver comprehensive primary health services, addressing the pressing healthcare needs of those who face barriers to receiving quality care. The initiative focuses on ensuring that vulnerable populations in Guwahati can access timely medical consultations, treatments and health education.

Kone Elevators’ commitment to this cause highlights their dedication to social impact and community welfare. By joining forces with Smile Foundation, they are contributing to a significant improvement in healthcare accessibility and quality for residents of Guwahati, demonstrating the powerful role that corporate partnerships can play in advancing public health.
